description: Identification of technical implementation nuances lost during the 437-to-40 node consolidation.

values.name: Log Archival Mandate
values.rule: Move processed .txt streams from dynamic/stream/ to a .gitignore'd archive directory upon successful summary commit.
values.rationale: Prevents redundant processing and maintains a clean active workspace. Identified in bloom logic/workflows/.

values.name: Screenshot Indexing Rule
values.rule: Every batch of PNG artifacts must be accompanied by an updated Screenshots.md index in the daily Heartwood branch.
values.rationale: Enables narrative context to bridge with visual evidence. Identified in bloom configuration/modules/.

values.name: Wait for Auth Pattern
values.rule: Recognize and filter the 'Waiting for auth...' noise pattern during log ingestion.
values.rationale: Increases LLM efficiency by removing non-technical session artifacts. Identified in bloom configuration/parsing_config/.
